alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 1:18PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Light Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches near the Laramie Range, with 1 to 2 inches further north near Wheatland. * WHERE...Southwest Platte County and the central Laramie Range. * WHEN...8 PM MST this evening until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling snow. Dangerously cold wind chills may lead to frost bite or hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
